name: Pivoting People for PC
description:
Test your attention to detail by finding the one character that looks exactly like the one in the picture on the left - to the finest detail -  like the color of the bow tie - among all the other characters that are specifically designed to confuse you.   The characters are rotated and placed on colored circles just to challenge you even more. 

 Mix and match the settings as you want them; you can also change them at any stage during the game and continue playing from where you left off:

  • Timed mode - find the character within a fixed amount of time. Casual mode gives you more time than expert mode.
  • Click mode only allows you a few mistakes per level. Casual mode allows you more mistakes than expert mode.
  • You can turn off both timed mode and click mode.

 Earn gold by finding all 30 people per level without a single mistake.

You can pass the level by finding at least 25 out of 30 people (you can skip a picture if you're struggling with it.)

Replay any level.

 The people you have to find and the placement of the people in the circles are all randomly selected and will be different each time you play.

This game is also available for Android devices.

(The zip file is to work with itch.io game console.  The exe file includes an installer / uninstaller - you only need 1.)
